title: Peoples Protests against Government continue
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Several protests were held throughout the country on Friday (8) night demanding the immediate resignation of the present Government, that has failed in solving the crises.
Notably, these protests are taking place with zero political intervention.
Businessmen and employees representing IT companies in Sri Lanka joined a protest at the Liberty Roundabout in Colpetty on Friday (8).
Police hunt for Mirihana fire starters; Sketch of wanted suspect released
